item.description: What better way to spend Friday the 13th than at a masquerade ball? Boston Young Professionals Association is hosting a celebratory bash with a Night Circus theme. Contortionists, bubbles, Venetian masks, and a night of mayhem have been promised. Ball gowns, gloves, bowler hats, and coat and tails welcomed. Black, red, and white attire requested. Tickets are $25 if you buy them before March 31; $35 from April 1-9; and $40 April 10-13. Let's go! Who doesn't love a masquerade?
item.name: Night Circus, a Masquerade Ball
